comments:
After startupt eclipse show its splash screen and opens the first
perspective. When moving the cursor into any pane the message
'An error has occured when activating this view' is displayed. Java 
shows the following error 'java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException'. 
Eventually the ide will crash totally. The error is reproducable
under j2se-1.3.0_02 and j2se-1.4.0_01.

I am using a remote X-Display-Server and Ecplipse Build: 200206271827.
See the output of xdpyinfo and the resulting stacktrace.

Grant, is it that we don't support this resolution or that we simply have a bug 
in the gradient code?

This was previously reported but I could never duplicate it.  However it looks 
like all of the reporters are using remote terminals, so this is likely causing 
the problem.  I'll try to reproduce it through something like xwin or Exceed.


*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 7435 ***
